alert.note: Alert for Knox (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 24 at 6:39AM EST until December 24 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO NOON EST SUNDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills occurring. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 10 to 20 below zero. * WHERE...Knox county. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until 10 AM EST this morning. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 10 AM this morning to noon EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
